story.title: Our Story
story.content:
Once upon a time, in a bus to the European Parliament in Strasbourg, a handsome Romanian guy met a cute Czech girl. And they started to like each other a lot because sometimes AMAAAAAAAZING things happen...

Read the full story in the slideshow bellow. Enjoy! :)
slides: The New-Europeans' Story

Once upon a time, in a bus to the European Parliament in Strasbourg, a handsome Romanian guy met a cute Czech girl. And they started to like each other a lot because sometimes AMAAAAAAAZING things happen...

Very soon Stefan won Kristyna's heart because he was very nice, kind, funny, smart and, of course, gorgeus... He was like a charming prince from some fairy tale... He was brave and he was helping people in danger or in need.
Not long after they met again in Konrad bar and their beautiful journey has started...
It wasn't always easy... But although they were fighting from time to time and sometimes they felt like they did not understand each other...
... they liked and appreciated each other so much... and they really liked spending time together...
Stefan soon found out that Kristyna is not an ordinary girl
And Kristyna found out how special Stefan is and how happy she is with him...
After, they have been separated and they found out how much they need each other...
... so, one day Stefan said: "I would really live with you.". And Kristyna said: "Me too"
And they spent so many AMAAAZING moment together...
First night together in a tent - Carpathian Mountains 2017
First vacation together - Asia 2018
First summer camp together - Šteflovka 2019
With their dear four-legged family member, Max - Romania 2020
Road trip with Max - Slovenia 2021
One question, one answer for an eternity - Lipno 2022
A wonder joined their family. Thank you for choosing them, Olivia! - Hořovice 2023
First vacation with Olivia - Skiathos 2024
Experiecing new type of partying: at the kindergarden - Bucharest 2025
And they have lived happily ever after!

location.title: Location & Travel
location.venueDescription: A beautiful historic mill nestled in the picturesque Czech countryside near Prague. This enchanting venue combines rustic charm with elegant sophistication, providing the perfect setting for our special day.
location.fromPragueDetails: The venue is approximately 20 km southwest of Prague city center. There is no public transport available.
location.fromAirportDetails: Václav Havel Airport Prague (PRG) is the nearest international airport, approximately 30 km from the venue. Allow about 30-40 minutes for the journey.
location.transportationDetails: For those that fly in and need transport from the airport, we will have a minivan which will run between the airport and the venue on Friday afternoon and Saturday morning. Just make sure that you let us know in advance about your plans. For more flexibility to explore the beautiful Czech countryside at your own pace, we recommend renting a car at the airport.
location.accommodationDetails: We will provide accommodation on Saturday night at the venue. We'll be there starting Friday, so if you'd like to join us on Friday as well, please let us know and we can arrange accommodation for you. Parking is available at the venue for everyone.
